channel.title: A simple program make!
channel.description:
Does anyone knw how to make a basic program that goes through all of the character files who are over 25000 and look for all the people that have over 50 pk points ?
Cahr file looks like this
[code][ACCOUNT] character-username = Legacy character-password = 981089799107
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 2248 character-posy = 3181 character-rights = 0 crystal-bow-shots = 0 skull-timer = -1 magic-book = 1 brother-info = 0 0 brother-info = 1 0 brother-info = 2 0 brother-info = 3 0 brother-info = 4 0 brother-info = 5 0 special-amount = 10.0 selected-coffin = 0 barrows-killcount = 0 teleblock-length = 0 pc-points = 18 slayerTask = -1 taskAmount = 0 magePoints = 0 autoRet = 1 barrowskillcount = 0 flagged = false wave = 0 gwkc = 0 fightMode = 1 void = 0 0 0 0 0 tradeTimer = 0 pkPoints = 12 memberStatus = 0 donatorChest = 0 betaPlayer = 0 KC =139 DC =123 character-expLock = false ban-marks = 0 cluescroll = 0
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 4708 1 character-equip = 1 6570 1 character-equip = 2 6585 1 character-equip = 3 15312 1 character-equip = 4 4712 1 character-equip = 5 6889 1 character-equip = 6 -1 0 character-equip = 7 4714 1 character-equip = 8 -1 0 character-equip = 9 7462 1 character-equip = 10 11732 1 character-equip = 11 -1 0 character-equip = 12 6733 1 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 3 character-look = 2 21 character-look = 3 30 character-look = 4 33 character-look = 5 38 character-look = 6 42 character-look = 7 15 character-look = 8 8 character-look = 9 1 character-look = 10 2 character-look = 11 3 character-look = 12 5
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 99 13918000 character-skill = 1 93 7671000 character-skill = 2 99 27296500 character-skill = 3 99 21667068 character-skill = 4 91 6469500 character-skill = 5 80 2008800 character-skill = 6 94 8693768 character-skill = 7 92 7020380 character-skill = 8 1 0 character-skill = 9 1 0 character-skill = 10 1 0 character-skill = 11 1 0 character-skill = 12 1 0 character-skill = 13 27 10640 character-skill = 14 76 1408840 character-skill = 15 55 168980 character-skill = 16 1 0 character-skill = 17 40 38000 character-skill = 18 61 309150 character-skill = 19 46 73450 character-skill = 20 1 0 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0
[ITEMS] character-item = 0 2348 1 character-item = 1 441 1 character-item = 2 441 1 character-item = 3 441 1 character-item = 4 441 1 character-item = 5 441 1 character-item = 6 441 1 character-item = 7 441 1 character-item = 8 441 1 character-item = 9 441 1 character-item = 10 441 1 character-item = 11 441 1 character-item = 12 441 1 character-item = 13 441 1 character-item = 14 441 1 character-item = 15 441 1 character-item = 16 441 1 character-item = 17 441 1 character-item = 18 441 1 character-item = 19 441 1 character-item = 20 441 1 character-item = 21 441 1 character-item = 22 441 1 character-item = 23 441 1 character-item = 24 441 1 character-item = 25 441 1 character-item = 26 441 1 character-item = 27 441 1
[BANK] character-bank = 0 4414 1 character-bank = 1 2494 2
[FRIENDS] character-friend = 0 935209634 character-friend = 1 210634909 character-friend = 2 375644 character-friend = 3 66757652322411 character-friend = 4 2416289677019205558
[EOF][/code]

item.title: A simple program make!
item.dc:creator: @IamGretar IamGretar
item.description:
@IamGretar wrote:

Does anyone knw how to make a basic program that goes through all of the character files who are over 25000 and look for all the people that have over 50 pk points ?
